I'm not a close-minded Bitcoiner, I've held these Shitcoins:  1. ETH (bought for $0.30) 2. XRP (free giveaway) 3. XLM (airdrop) 4. STEEM (made $25k gaming it) 5. XMR (was a fan until recent hardfork) 6. CVC (thought product was interesting) 7. LTC (used it to arb LTC/BTC prices)

I've gotten the same question asked many times in the last 2 days "have you sold any of your positions in LTC, BTC, etc."   The answer is that I haven't yet sold any of my positions in any of my cryptos, and I REALLY don't plan on doing so anytime soon, especially at these prices
